about_the_game:
Lily was a normal student. She attends St. Ludmilla’s Academy with her friends. She never thought she would wake up one day in The Ritual. What is The Ritual? She needs to find out.

Lily and Taro are separated from the rest of their group, and they must find their way back. Did the others even survive?

Set in a prestigious boarding school, you must navigate through the winding hallowed halls of St. Ludmilla’s Academy that has become your prison. Who is your captor? You must hide from the evils of the school that was so perfectly concealed for all this time. How was it concealed? While dodging and running from the evils St. Ludmilla’s has to offer, you find clues and unravel the mystery of The Ritual.



You must run and hide from the creatures that seemed to have crawled out from the depths of hell. Dodge the monsters, or you WILL be their next meal.



Find clues and items to help you solve the mysteries of St. Ludmilla’s Academy. Everything is not what it seems…



Solve interesting puzzles to unlock the secrets of The Ritual. You must use your detective skills to discover all the hidden clues.
